body_html: We are actively working on open sourcing CLIF in the next few months. I suspect you should wait until we've released the tool before you start using it within the TF project. Providing py_clif_cc Bazel macros may not be part of that release given the current state of Bazel when it comes to Python support.
body_text: We are actively working on open sourcing CLIF in the next few months. I suspect you should wait until we've released the tool before you start using it within the TF project. Providing py_clif_cc Bazel macros may not be part of that release given the current state of Bazel when it comes to Python support.
body: We are actively working on open sourcing `CLIF` in the next few months. I suspect you should wait until we've released the tool before you start using it within the TF project. Providing `py_clif_cc` Bazel macros may not be part of that release given the current state of Bazel when it comes to Python support.
